snippet: The Ukrainian Parliament outlawed tents in public spaces and imposed other restrictions aimed at clearing out hundreds of demonstrators from Independence Square in the capital.
abstract: Ukrainian Parliament passes sweeping legislation outlawing unauthorized tents in public spaces and imposing other restrictions aimed at clearing out hundreds of demonstrators from Independence Square in Kiev; move draws immediate criticism from opposition leaders in Ukraine and from Western nations, including United States.
lead_paragraph: The Ukrainian Parliament outlawed tents in public spaces and imposed other restrictions aimed at clearing out hundreds of demonstrators from Independence Square in the capital.

headline.main: Sweeping New Restrictions Take Aim at Protesters Camped Out in Kiev
headline.print_headline: Sweeping New Restrictions Take Aim at Protesters Camped Out in Kiev
